title: STM32MP2 MPU Series Enhances Performance with 64-bit Architecture and 1.35 TOPS NPU
description: Last week, STMicroelectronics unveiled the STM32MP2 series, its second-generation line of 64-bit industrial microprocessors. Designed for intelligent edge computing, this new series is tailored for a broad range of applications, including smart factories, healthcare, buildings, and infrastructure. These are ST’s first MPUs to contain a 64-bit central processing unit (CPU). In contrast to its predecessor, […]
